articles.author: Carlo Martuscelli
articles.title: Thousands of Airbus planes grounded by software glitch - politico.eu
articles.description: Some 6,000 aircraft were affected by a technical malfunction linked to solar radiation.
articles.content:
A large part of Airbus's global fleet was grounded after the European airplane maker discovered a technical malfunction linked to solar radiation in its A320 family of aircraft.
Airbus said in a sta… [+1052 chars]
